properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 1 at 3:13PM EST until February 2 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...South Santee River SC to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY
